titles.title: Santa Claus Is Coming To Town

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You better watch out newline You better not cry newline Better not pout newline I'm telling you why newline Santa Claus is coming to town

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He's making a list, newline And checking it twice; newline Gonna find out Who's naughty and nice. newline Santa Claus is coming to town

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He sees you when you're sleeping newline He knows when you're awake newline He knows if you've been bad or good newline So be good for goodness sake!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O! You better watch out! newline You better not cry. newline Better not pout, I'm telling you why. newline Santa Claus is coming to town. newline Santa Claus is coming to town.
